H0.text: The novelist Dorothy L Sayers produced which advertising symbol for Guinness. Penguin

H1.text: The novelist Dorothy L Sayers produced which advertising symbol for Guinness. Lion

H2.text: The novelist Dorothy L Sayers produced which advertising symbol for Guinness. Horse

H3.text: The novelist Dorothy L Sayers produced which advertising symbol for Guinness. Tucan

A4.text: Dorothy L. Sayers created a sketch of the toucan and wrote several of the adverts in question.
